title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.9 - Notification as to litigation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.9 - Notification as to litigation

State Regulations

The commissioner shall promptly notify the appropriate
legal officer of the county and the appropriate fiscal officer of the county
shall promptly notify the deputy commissioner and counsel of DMV, of any
litigation instituted against either party which challenges the
constitutionality or validity of the local law imposing the tax or of the
enabling act under which it was adopted, or which attempts to limit or question
the applicability of either such law; and such notification shall include a
copy of the papers served upon either party. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
29.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
